column1: # NIRSpec Fixed-slit with various nods and dithers and off-target backgrounds
# This examples works through a number of the Nod/Sub-pixel patterns
# Initialize ACID. This is done with a dummy exposure that will not match any association
# There are two AC's defined. Set ACID to reflect this as a last dummy exposure
# Primary Dither=None, Sub-pixel Pattern=None, F100LP/G140H, using the background
# Set ACID to how many have been used.
